281b7: 'jigs nas 'khor lo bar ma btsugs so/ / dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i bu 'bring por gyur pa de bzhin yin pa snyam du sems na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// 'dis sngon 'das
281b8: pa'i dus su gus pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas pa dang / 'khor lo bar ma btsugs pa'i dge ba'i las des tshe rabs nyis stong lnga brgya'i bar du rtag par gling gcig la dbang ba'i stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po

282a1: byas so/ / tshe 'di la gal te rab tu 'byung bar ma gyur na/ de bzhin du stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la dbang bskur ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor mang po rnams btsam
282a2: du gyur nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos sngon las ci bgyis na/ nyan thos kyi nang ni dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog du bka' stsal lags//
282a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni sngon sngon lam gyi stobs las byung ba yin te/ dge slong dag dga' bo 'di sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan
282a4: pa las khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba las/ de'i mkhan po bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// des ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang
282a5: tshe 'di nyid las mngon par rtogs pa ci yang thob par ma gyur pas de mchi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ 'di skad du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du tshangs par spyad kyang / tshe 'di nyid la mngon par
282a6: rtogs bci yang med pas/ bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
282a7: bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mtshon yang shag kya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ zhes lung bstan pas bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa las byis nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa rnam
282a8: spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/ ji ltar bdag gis mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das 'di'i bstan pa las/ dbang po'i sgo rab tu sdom pa'i mchog tu gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das

282b1: da'i bstan pa las dab po'i sgorab tu sgom pa'i mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na/ smon lam de'i stobs kyis deng 'dir nga'i bstan pa las/ nyan thom kyi nang na dbang po'i sgod bdu sdom pa'i mchog dgyur pa yin no// 'di ltar dge slong dag gang
282b2: gcig tug dag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag go/ gang gcig tu dkar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ro// las 'dren ma gang yin pa de ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren par myong bar 'gyur te/ de skangs
282b3: na khyed kyis gcig tu gnag pa dang / 'dren ma'i las stongs la gcig tu dkar ba'i las bsgrub par bya'o// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam gras le'u stong brag brgya ba las mngal du
282b4: 'jug par bstan pa'i mdo ste/ 'dus pa bcu gsus ba rdzogs s+ho//
282b5: @rgya ga skad du/ ar+ya man dzu shri bud d+hak+ki guN+Da b+hu ha na nA ma ma hA yAn s+saH/
282b6: bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
282b7: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang
282b8: ngan song sel dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen tho ba las stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong 'di lta ste/ thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog

283a1: ba sha stag dang thabs gcig du bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi
283a2: bdag po tshangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri nyi stong dang yang thabs gcig go/ 'di lta ste/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po
283a3: stobs can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po phrag rtsub dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dga' dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi thams cad kyang g.yog lha ma yin brgya'i stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs gcig go// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dgal
283a4: bo dang / klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ri be bo dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud las
283a5: rgyal ba dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba'i bla ma las stsogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang // 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen
283a6: po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi thams cad kyang g.yog brgya'i stong du ma dang bcas bdag dang / gnod sbyin kum b+hir dang / 'brog gnas dang / khab spu dang / yid bzangs dang / blo gros bzang po dang / dbyibs bas
283a7: dang / kun nas kha dog dang / gnod sbyin mi 'khrugs pa dang / de dag dang / gnod sbyin gzhan brgya stong dang yang thabs gcig go/ yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nye bar gnas shing bzhugs te/
283a8: dang / pradang / na gyi dang / ri bdang / sum yin dang / rnams brjid dang / sa'ang dang / sta bya chen pa dang / me dang pa ma yin pa dag dang / 'bang she rnams kyi tid byas/ thas

283b1: thong byas nas/ mdza cing gsas te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / spun gyi gsos sman dang / la byad bzang ba ma
283b2: bzhes so/ / yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe// sham thabs dang chos gos gsol// lhung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu/ lta bye ba khrag khrig kyi stong gis yongs
283b3: su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos/ me tog ud pal dang / kra mud dang /
283b4: pad ma dkar po'i char chen po ni mngon par 'bebs/ sil snyan brgya'i stong ni dkrol nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim du/ bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te/ 'od gcer bye ba khrag khrig
283b5: brgya stong yang rab tu phyung ngo / / de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas zhabs gang dgang du bzhag pa'i zhabs bzhag pa de dang der pad ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam/
283b6: mdab ma ni gser/ chu ba ni dngul/ ze ba ni bai dur+ya/ snying po ni nor bu bzang po dang ldan pa rnams byung ste// pad ma de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dag 'byung bde
283b7: sta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ mngon par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag pad ma de dag dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun du bskor ba byed cing / tshigs
283b8: su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ / skye bo rnams la phan mdzad ded dpon gang/ yon gyi gnas gang dge ba rnams mdzad pa// shag kya khyu mchog blo zhi bdag nyid me// 'jig rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs// lha'i

284a1: gnas su gang rnams rtson pa dang / / de bzhin rga dang 'chi las thar 'dod dang // bdud kyi sde rnams pham par gang 'dod pa// nges ni shag kya'i seng ge mchod par gyis// 'gro ba rnams la phan zhing thugs brtse'i
284a2: phyir/ bskal pa bye bar spyad pa rnam spyod pa// thub pa rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed par dka'// thub pa de deng rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhed// zas skom de bzhin gos dang gzhon pa dang // bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams dang ni/
284a3: sbyin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba// kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab du gshegs// lag pa rkang pa mig dang rna ba dang // sna dang yan lag dam pa mgo btang ste// kun btang yon tan ldan pa gtong pod pa/
284a4: des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so// sbyin dang dul dang sdom la gang bslab shing // skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa// bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa// zhi ba'i thugs de grong du deng
284a5: gshegs so/ / sdug bsngal bying ba'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas// brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing // bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa med dang ldan// tshangs dbyangs de ni de ring grong khyer gshegs
284a6: drang srong chen po de'i shes rab ni/ / mtshungs med nam mkha'i khams ltar dpag tu med// bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag kyang // spyod pa dang ni rnam par sbyin pas sbyangs// blo ldan gang gis bdud kyi sde bcom zhing //
284a7: mi g.yo go 'phang mya ngan med pa brnyes// chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab bskor te// chos kyi dbang phyug de ni grong khyer gshegs// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa'i sku// bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dad
284a8: ba ni/ / snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems zhog ste// mchod pa'i phyir ni de yi zad du song // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba dang // de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa// de ni ston pa'i thad da nyer song la/

284b1: mchod pa rnams ma mtha' yas myur du gyis// tshangs pa dang ni lha'i dbang phyug dang // brgya byin nyid ni thob par su 'dod cing // lha'i bde bas rtag tu rtson dga' ba// de ni thub pa mchod phyir nye bar song // gling bzhi'i bdag
284b2: bo rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing / / rin chen mchog bdun rang gas 'thob pa dang // bu mchog stang rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa// sems can mchog la des myur mchod pagyis// khyim bdag tshong dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang /
284b3: mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang // longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa// de ni deng song thub la mchod pagyis// gang su rnam par grol dang 'gro ba kun// thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos
284b4: nas te/ / 'dren pa rnams kyis yang 'dir dkon gyis// de byer chos nyin du ni der myur deng // de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag tshigs su bcad pa de dag
284b5: gis bskul nas/ / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma'i pur ma thogs// gser dang dngul gyi me tog gi pur ma thogs
284b6: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan thogs/ rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / bi bang rgyud gcig pa dang / sgra snyan pa dang / gling bu dang / khar dkrol dang / kim pa la dang / nakul dang / bi ba
284b7: thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob cing 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
284b8: 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa sgo'i thim pa la bzhag ma thag du/ de nas grong khyer thams cad rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos/ lha dang mi'i sal snyan

285a1: brgya stong yang ma dgrol bar sgra byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang rab tu bab ste// sems can long ba rnams ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos/ sems can spyor pa
285a2: rnam pa ni dran pa thog/ sems pad bral pa masan tu gcig pathab/ sems can gas bu mas nag sa rnyang / sems can pathas pa dan sa sa d+hAd / rnams sa dpa panapan //
285a3: sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba med de/ zhe sdang gis ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ thobs ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin no// de'i tshe na sems can
285a4: thams cad kyang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan 'ang phan tshun dra pa mar 'du shes par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces byaste// sangs rgyas skyes bu'i seng ga cha// stobs bcu thong khyer nas gzugs
285a5: de yi mod la skya bo rnams/ / bde ba rgya chen dri med thob// long ba'i mig rnams mthong bar 'gyur// 'on pa thos pa'i mthu yang skyes// spros pa dag ni dran pa rnyed// yid brel rtse gcig de bzhin no// gcer bu dag ni gos
285a6: rnyed de/ / bkres pa dag gis zas thob bo// skyes bu gang su dbul po yang // dga' bar nor rnams rnyed par 'gyur// lha rnams bya ba mang po yang // mkha' la gnas shing stobs rab mchod// smra ba'i seng ge mchod
285a7: pa'i phyir/ me tog char kyang rab du 'bebs// rnga dang rdza rnga sil snyan dung // nyams dga' byed pa dpag med pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis// grong khyer 'jug tshe sgra yang 'byung // grong khyer kun tu rab
285a8: g.yos te/ / de tshe nyams dga' mnyam par gnas// skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas// dga' ba shin tu rgya chen thob// 'dod chags kyis ni mi gzir zhing // de tshe khro blun ser sna med// nga rgyal la stsogs

285b1: nyes pas kyang / / gzir ba de tshem lus med// dga' bas khyab cing dad pa ste// mi rnams tha mar 'du shes 'gyur// gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs bcu po// skye bo bde phyir grong gshegs tshe//
285b2: me yi ma yin sel snyan rnams// ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung // 'jig rten lha min lha mor bcas// bde gshegs 'od kyis rgyas par gang // de ltar gang tshe sangs rgyas ni// 'grol phan phyir grod gshegs
285b3: pa/ de tshe ngo mtshar mad byung ba// rnam pa ma po rab tu gda'// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa dang / tshong dpon shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu sdig bcom zhes bya ba/ byang chub/
285b4: sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa grong par zhig na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis// bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog
285b5: gi pha rol du byon pa/ bsdams pa/ glang ba ltar dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cing gsala~M ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ da
285b6: byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku legs par brgyan pa/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ rgyad ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la/ sems shin tu dad par
285b7: gyur to/ / de sems shin du dad nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der so ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs
285b8: gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom

286a1: ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ myur du than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyogasangs/
286a2: rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul ba'i
286a3: dbang gi phyir/ grong byed kyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so// phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mthong nas/ srog chags brgya stong mang po dag kyang lhags par gyur to// bar snang las kyang lbab+he bawa
286a4: khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig
286a5: bcom la bka' stsal pa/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang na chos gcig dang ldan na/ myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi
286a6: zhing yang yongs su skyong la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa da lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to/ / chos gcig po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
286a7: sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems skyed pa'o// de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam
286a8: ba zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas/ mi dge ba'i las gang yang mi spyod pa'o// ci mi spyod ce na/ 'dod chags mi spyod// zhe sdang mi spyod/ gti mug mi spyod/ khyim pa'i rtags la med pa

286b1: mas na pa dang / sa dang / gsams dam da // gyu ga/ da' na ga/ padag
286b2: za zhin du rabatu rtags pa'o/ / dzas thams cad yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pag she na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad cas bya ba ni// phung po dang / khams dang / skyes ched dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi
286b3: rnams so/ / phung po lnga rab tu rtogs pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na/ phung po lnga rnams sbrums bu dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par rab ga rtogs pa ste/ ji ltar rab tu rtogs
286b4: pa yang / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o// gang gi tshe/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi shes/ rlom sems su mi byed/ mi rtog/ rnam par rtog pa da'i tshe/ rtog pa thams cad nya bar zhi ba ni phung po
286b5: rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ / gang phung por rab tu rtogs pa de/ chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa zhes bya'o// de// dazhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon/ sems
286b6: can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ji ltar bdag gis chos de dag yongs su shes par gyur pa/ de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang / sems can dang chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bu byang
286b7: chubasems dpa' mams dpa' chen pa/ tshas gcig po 'dir ldanan/ sbyar du zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par dka' 'chang rgyadang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mongs su spyod pas sa rgyas kyi ni gi yo tan
286b8: bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/ yongs su bsgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig btsam/ mi skye ba'i chos la

287a1: bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba des// shing ta la bdun srid tsam du/ bar snang la mngon par 'phags so// 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags nyi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
287a2: pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i srog chags khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//
287a3: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas// kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'gro ba/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang /
287a4: dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
287a5: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan lam langs nas// bla gom phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
287a6: mo sbyar ba btud de/ / bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol byin/ 'dren pa khyod ni rgyal po'i stobs la mnga'// khyod ni thams cad mkhyen par 'jig rten grags// tsi ya~M
287a7: slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs/ / thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen// de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus rnams kyang mkhyen// da ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa/ ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsungs// rab 'bring
287a8: tha ma'i sems dang ldan pa yi/ / sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen// chags grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lung bstan gsol// lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags te// skyon ma

287b1: mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing / / skye bo chos spyod 'di dag kun spyod kyis// thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung byung gsol// khyod ni ye shes pa rol byin// khyod la 'khrul pa yod mi mnga'// spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa/
287b2: ci zhig slang du 'dzum pa bstan// bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag/ chos rnams 'tshal ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te// de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag/ dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis/
287b3: khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sal snyan rnams// rab tu bzang ni mang ba brdung bar bgyid// skye bo mang po the tsom 'tshal ba kun// thub pa deng 'dir the tsom myur gcad gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
287b4: ldan bkun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di/ shing ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam// kun dga' bos gsol
287b5: pabacom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di bskal bgrang ba med
287b6: ba bcu stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/
287b7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang sa rgyas rab tun zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ kun dga' bo per na/ daltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig na
287b8: gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

288a1: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang de las mi lhag mi thub par 'gyur ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs de nas gshegs te/
288a2: mthar kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas/ byon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa dag la 'khod do// de nas rgyal po
288a3: ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge bdun bzhugs par rig nas/ bdag nyid lag bdar te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myad pa bzang po mang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge slong gi dge
288a4: 'dun la bstabs te/ tshim par byas so// bstabs te tshim par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol pa dang // lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ras bcos
288a5: bu'i zung ring thang med pa sku la gsol to/ / sku la gsol nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te/ stan rin pa zhig blangs nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
288a6: 'dug nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa gang nas 'byung ba lags// mi shes pa ci las skye ba lags
288a7: mi shes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lags/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las gnod sems
288a8: dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon tan dang / nyes pa mi shes te/ de bas na mi shes pa zhes bya'o// gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir

288b1: 'dzin pa de/ yang dag par lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de la ni/ shes pa 'am/ mi shes pa zhes gdags par mi nus so// de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro ba dang / gang nas kyang 'ong bar
288b2: mi gdags pa de ltar bslab par bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po gang gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de la/ chos gang yang 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba med do// gang la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa de la/ skye ba med// 'gag pa
288b3: med do/ / gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa med do// shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa'ang de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro// gang gi tshengs par 'byung ba'am/ nges par
288b4: mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa de'i tshe/ ye shes can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
288b5: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ legs par gsungs pa ngo mthar to// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag par skabs 'di kho nar 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na ni/ bdag nyid mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro//
288b6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgral/ chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzang bstod// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas// gdan las bzhengs te/
288b7: gshegs nas// byi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ yang chos kyi ston pa la 'dra bar 'gyur ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis lan spangs te/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bzhag nas/ zhabs kus te/ nang du yang dag
288b8: 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzhengs nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ chos yang dag par rab tu

289a1: bstan pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du/ nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ ribi rgyal po byi rgod kyi phung po gal ba dang /
289a2: bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang / nang du yang dag 'jog
289a3: las langs te/ lha'i bu bzhi khri nyi stong thams cad kyang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan gcig du/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba dang dong ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan
289a4: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas// lhan cig tu bcom
289a5: ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal kyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra yang /
289a6: byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
289a7: 'khod do/ / rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig du/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ phyin nas/ bcom
289a8: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po gal ba dang / bcom ldan

289b1: 'das gal ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
289b2: pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du/ byang chub
289b3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom gyis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan bkod pa la brtsams te/ yongs su zhus pa de'i san/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngongs
289b4: zhig bka' stsal na/ / bcom ldan 'das de yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de la brtsams te/ ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
289b5: dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sde rnams tham par bgyid pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par
289b6: 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
289b7: sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste// byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin
289b8: du/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar/ chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol// bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di ni rigs kyi bu dang /

290a1: gas kyin byang da du nyer ba 'dus shing ma rnams bcom ldan 'dasalamams mngan ma dums nas/ dga' ba dang / ga tu dag ba chen po yar 'jug/ deg ga pa dang / drug
290a2: bathob nas/ ji ltar thos pa bzhin du nan tan gyis sgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par bya na/ 'khor 'di lta bu ni mi mdzes kyis ngas je lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par
290a3: 'du bya ba/ mngon par 'byas pas/ phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re rer yang / 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgyal stong mang po bkye la/ 'od gzer re res kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/ sangs
290a4: rgyas kyi zhing de dag du nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing / de dag 'od gzer de dag gis/ zil gyis mnan nas/ byir mig gi dbang po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyi 'od kyang mi mngon/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang / nor bu dang
290a5: glogro dang / me dang / skar ma'i gzugs dang / sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang / mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i khar yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / btang bzung dang /
290a6: btang bzung chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri ri ba dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri'i rgyal po nag po dag dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po dag dang / rtsig pa dang / shing dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad 'od gzer de dag gis thal byung du snang
290a7: bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdza 'phrul mngon par 'du byab mngon par bya'o snyam du dgongs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od gzer bkye nas/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra des phyogs ba
290a8: na tu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu mad pa dag sgras go bar gyur to/ / yang de'i tshen/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi

290b1: khams kun nas 'ong zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stod to// sangs rgyas kyi shi
290b2: na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi zag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sams dpa'i chags ral dang /
290b3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes bya ba zhig gnas te/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'ade
290b4: chos 'phags shes b+ha zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis bskur cing chos ston pa'i stan snga/ shing / la bdu sri tsam
290b5: bar snang la 'phags te/ lus mi snang ba gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs kyi chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag
290b6: thams cad ni snyatsam mo/ / ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'adi'i lus mi snang mod kyi/ bshad pa yang zag la/ sku yang 'byin te/ gzugs yongs su grub pa yang mi snang ngo // dzig par gzugs kyang de bzhin do//
290b7: gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no snyam mo// de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags shes bya'o// byang chub
290b8: sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de yang mthong / / gsung bsal ba'i sgra yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga la ba der song ste/ byin nas/

291a1: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di
291a2: skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba/ 'di'i rgyu gang lag pa/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba 'di lta bu ni/ sngon
291a3: chang ma mthong ngo / / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
291a4: chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs su/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'i ded ces bya
291a5: ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe'o// gzhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
291a6: rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag nas/ / byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir/ baspu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od gzer 'di dag btang ste/ bsung
291a7: b.ral ba'i sgra phyung ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bag
291a8: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur 'bye ba dang / byang chub

291b1: ma 'ag su dang/ ya 8/ / na / ga na// nga na
291b2: sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug bri sum stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bad R+sha nas/ 'di lta ste dbar du/ sgras bu stobs pa ches len pa brnam pa las brnya ba dang/
291b3: brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che ba 'phags
291b4: de'itshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu
291b5: de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gi tshogs chen po bus nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/ / sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gdugs dang /
291b6: rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to// spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang / khyad par med par gyur te// de nas byang chub
291b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa ga la bder
291b8: dong ste/ lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i bdag dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu

292a1: 6/ / 'khod do// yang de'i tshe lce phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ni dbye ba khrag theg gang gA'i glang dgu bcu rtsa drug gi byem snyed 'das pan 'jig rten gyi khams dus med pa gas bya ba de na/ de shin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa /
292a2: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas se ge'i rgyal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ nyan thos dang
292a3: rang sangs rgyas rnams med de/ / yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i phyir lag na rin po che shes byen na/ yang rigs kyi bu de rnam
292a4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas/ lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra
292a5: 'byung ngo / / chos rin po che'i dang / dge 'dun rin po tsho sgra 'byung ngo // sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / tsun 'grus dang / ba ma gan dang / shes rab na pa che'i sgra byung // byams pa dang / hrI dang/
292a6: dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rin po'i tshe'i sgra 'byung ngo // de dag dang / gzhan yang / chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung ste/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu lag na rin po che zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'
292a7: lag na rin po ches/ snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal bar sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas dge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas/
292a8: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

292b1: pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba/ 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags// bcom ldan 'das/
292b2: kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu byang phyogs su/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klu dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
292b3: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho shing gzhes la/ chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
292b4: tsha med/ / grangs med pa dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos bsgrag pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing / gsung bsal ba'i sgra byung ngo // yang rigs
292b5: kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/ der byang chub sems dpa' dpag du med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
292b6: yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i rgyal gyis pa sgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi 'ams
292b7: mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de la yang ba
292b8: pa dang chos bstan pa de yang nyan dumachi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod der song ste ci rung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang

293a1: / 2 na gdes / blang na pa mas dpa ku na / 'dug/ sa
293a2: bstings pa de la 'dan cas gsos to/ / tsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kags thab pa des don bye nga ci zhig gcigs na/ bcom ldan dasas rgyas kyi dang yongs
293a3: dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kye di ngan pa yongs su 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des
293a4: nas kyang sems can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos bstan par bya'o zhes yun ring po nas/ smon lam btab par gyur te// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
293a5: gshegs pa shag kya thub pa ni da ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa se ge'i rgyal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ 'di skad ces
293a6: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
293a7: 'di ltar thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag tu thub pa de dgaka' ba sad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
293a8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu ni 'byung bar dka'o/ / de mthong ba yang rnyed par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na/ song la rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi

293b1: zhing der rab tu bsgrim bgyis shig/ smras par gyur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsnyen par dka'o// de na sems can gzhan de dag kyang gtum zhing khro bdag go/ de skad ces bka'
293b2: stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis/ bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang rjes su 'chags pa dang / khong /
293b3: khro bar 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der smras par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la ni rjes su 'chags pa'ang ma mchis/ khong khro ba yang ma mchis na// bdag ci'i slad du sbas par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das bdag la sems can thams
293b4: cad kyis/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gshe zhing smyos te/ bsdigs shing btsogs nas/ bong ba dang / mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par spro ste/ sems can gang la'ang gnad par bgyi ba'i sems mi skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
293b5: bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa des/ rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag khyed las gang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin
293b6: par spro ba de/ / rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der deng shig/ bcom ldan 'das des tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor de'i nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyi
293b7: stong gis/ dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o zhes gsol to// de nas
293b8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyi stong gis yongs su bskor cing / mdun du bdar ste/ lhan cig du sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang

294a1: bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag rdzu 'phrul ji lta bus/ bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro
294a2: zhing sems can pad med pa la/ ji ltar bde bar byasnyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g.yas bkab nas/
294a3: lag pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la/ bza' ba byung ba dang / btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / de bzhin du bzhon pa dang / gos dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang /
294a4: byu ru dang / su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang chos don tu gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa de dag gis kyang / lag pa de las chos thos par gyur pa dang /
294a5: de na sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa dang / sems can gang nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu bde ba dang ldan
294a6: par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub
294a7: sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
294a8: gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi

294b1: zhing bye ba phrag khrig baH/ stong gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i snying zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba/ da ltar yang bzhugs
294b2: te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la/ chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bai dUr+ya bzang po 'ba' shig las mngon par grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
294b3: theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gis yongs su gang ngo // yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams 'gro yang rung / 'od yang
294b4: rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / ldang yang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/ de dag gis bai dUr+ya'i sa chen po de las/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de mthong ngo // 'di lta ste dper na/ shin tu
294b5: byis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la/ bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis be dUr+ya'i sa chen po de las/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste// de bzhin gshegs
294b6: pade yang de dag la lung ston to/ / de dag kyang chos thos nas/ bzod pa thob bo// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi spu'i dbus su yang / nor bu rin po che chen po mngon
294b7: par grub ste/ nor bu rin po me de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ me tog 'azums pa dang / me tog 'bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par/ nyi ma dang zla bar bangon
294b8: pa yang med/ / nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang med do// yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal ba de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros shes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub

295a1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis skang ba chen pa dayang mthong / / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthang zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de ga la ba der/
295a2: dong ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de
295a3: bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba/ 'di'i rgyu ga lags/ rkyen gang lags// bcom
295a4: ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ / rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong / gang ga'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod ces bu ba yod de/
295a5: den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag thig da
295a6: med grangs med pa dag nas/ / byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i phyir/ spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung gsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon
295a7: lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams myi mdzad der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub
295a8: bde la brta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsten bskur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes

295b1: na song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu cu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig du sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas
295b2: myi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
295b3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro bar bya snyam mo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang /
295b4: dud 'dra phyeganas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i ma yang dasu zhi bar gyur ba dang /
295b5: sems can gang dag bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres sgom pa dang bral zhing / bdeb mchog dang ldan par gyur pa/ 'di lta ste
295b6: dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad cig de nyid la/ sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas/ skad cig de nyid la/ sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/
295b7: thob 'am/ brgyal lam/ 'chab pa 'am// 'chog pa 'am/ phrag dog gam/ ser sna 'am/ g.yo'am/ thaba'am/ gnod sa mas kyis gzir ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang / skad cig da nyid nga/
295b8: byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas te/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'

296a1: pa aH/ rdzu yul ma 'thas rnam pa // tha'ad nanas/ byang chus ngas da sams da pa dag dag can tu/ mam na dpa gagags padamam nga
296a2: yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gags thub pa gal pa dang das/ / sngags nas/ bcom ldan da kyi pa la gapas rgyag 'tshal te/ ma ma ldan 'das la la dgas pa ga babyas nas/ sngon sa pa ga ba bzhin
296a3: ba'i bad ma de dgala'akha dang bcas te/ phyogs gcig tu'a'ad/ @ gnyis pa/ 'a da'i byang phyogs sus sa rgyas kyizhi 'dinas/
296a4: rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang
296a5: rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshan gnas la/ chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa med de/ byang chub sems pa de dag thams cad gos drang smrig 'chad pa sha stag go/
296a6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ bud med kyi ming yang med cing / mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon cing / skyil mo krung bcas par brdzus te 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das
296a7: deyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to// de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhen/ gang 'di byang chub du sems dang pa
296a8: bskyed de/ de ltar byang chub duse mas bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde sdong la 'jug pa/ gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/ sems mi g.yeng ba/ gtong ba rjes su gtangadag

296b1: stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ mtshan ma med pa la yang dag par sgrub pa/ smon pa med pa tshol ba/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rab tu rtogs pa/ 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags
296b2: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa/ de la mngon par dad pa/ chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ de dag la yongs su rtog pa me dag/ rtog pa yang dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes
296b3: bya'o/ yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de'i smon lam gyi khyad par ni 'di sa bu ste/ sems can
296b4: jisnyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de mthong ba de dag thams cad skyes bu chen po mtshan sum nu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' mchan gyis brgyan pa skar
296b5: ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos/ sdang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos ste/ mthong 'di thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das sa la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa gal ba der song ste/ byin nas/
296b6: bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
296b7: mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di dang / gsung bsal
296b8: ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po rgyal po 'byung ba des/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces

297a1: bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
297a2: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba de ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
297a3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa des/ gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgag pa'i phyir/ spu'i khung bu thams cad
297a4: nas/ 'od gzer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing / gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bgyi// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar
297a5: 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can 'dod chags la mi mjed/ zhe sdang la mi mjed/ gti mug la mi mjed/ sdug bsngal la mi mjed de/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de me mjed ces bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
297a6: sems can de dag las/ la las smyos pa dang / mi snyan par rjod pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdegs pa bzod cing dang du len par bgyid pa mchis sam// 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe/
297a7: sdang gi sems dang / gti mug gi sems sel ba mchis sam// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ sems can de dag las gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can de dag
297a8: las/ ngal tsher ni gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang mang ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun tu dkris so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab po//

297b1: gal te sems can de dag bzod par gyur na ni/ de yang rung na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na/ de'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das mi mjed bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog du ma bar po// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas
297b2: kyi zhing de na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bzod pa dang /
297b3: dul ba dang / nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi sa spyos/ bsdigs/ mtshon gyis btab kyang ji snyam mi mjed de/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrogs
297b4: so/ / rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gis 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de yang de na sems can kha cig sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ mu cor smra ba
297b5: khro ba/ gtum pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mi gus pa/ phrag dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsa
297b6: du spyos shing / smad de gnod par byas shing / bskur kyang bcom ldan 'das de snying rje bas bzod cing dang du len te/ sa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pas/ de sti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed
297b7: na dum byas kyang 'dud par mi byed de/ / de spyos shing brgyad kyang mi rtog/ rnam par me rtog/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrogs/ mi chags/ mi skye ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
297b8: rnga ban gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i byung ba de la/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan rnams kyis brgyan pa/ skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag

298a1: 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de tsam dud mad pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du mi skyes pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de skad mazer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
298a2: bu byad dang / shar kyi mtshams na/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang
298a3: bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes so// rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sems can rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ sems can rnams kyang bde ba de lta
298a4: bu dang ldan no/ / yang rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams stong sa brgyan pa der lo bya ba brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa pas ni/ gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du/ tha na sa gol gtogs pa srid tsam du/ sems can thams cad la byams
298a5: pa'i sems bskyed na/ de bas 'di bsod nams chas mang du skyed na/ gang nyin mtshan du yongs su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub
298a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
298a7: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/
298a8: rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing / lhan gcig du sems bskyed pa

298b1: gcig gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi rngu 'phrul gyi tshe 'bru 'dzin
298b2: bus/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa de'i thang du 'gro snyam nas// de de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis
298b3: khebs par gyur pa dang / rin pa che'i gdugs de las kyang / ma tog rnam pasna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'babasel snyan paH/ stong yang 'grol// mu tig gi rdzun 'phreng brgya spyod yang mngon par 'byung / gdugs dang / kun mcha dang /
298b4: dan brgya stong yang mngon par 'phyang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
298b5: yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/ rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par
298b6: 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
298b7: de dag dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan
298b8: 'dapal lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon la mdzes pa bzhin du blang ba'i pad ma dgal 'khor dang bcas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'bod de// de bzhin du sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten mo 'am bye ba khrag khrig brgya /

299a1: tshad med grangs med pa dag du yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/ rang rang gi bzhin gshegs pa la
299a2: yongs su zhus te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kakya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag
299a3: 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bkor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do// gang dag stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
299a4: nam mkha' lding dang / me 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od gzer bya
299a5: snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
299a6: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas/ phyogs bcu'i
299a7: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa ga pa da nas/ / byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir
299a8: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang / chu ne kyi

299b1: 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa'i snyan yangs su thub pa de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' da dgagasasas nas mthang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi se de dag ge byang chubs pas dpa' bun su ma gas pa ci 'dra
299b2: bdang / nyan thos chen po phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir yang / byang chub sems dpa' dag gis so sa nas shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang rang ga
299b3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du sems pa des bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khar
299b4: rgya po chen po de mthong nas/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbya rab btud
299b5: nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// phyogs bcu rnams su grags pa mtha' yas zo// 'jig rten lhar rabacas 'dir ni lham me ste// thub pa'i thugs ni sems
299b6: can thams cad kyis/ / tshad gzung mi nus de byer khyod bas ma yas// phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa// tshes tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags nas// bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus bcas nas/
299b7: smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs// phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa// tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo rnams kyis// seng ge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes ka/ nam mkha'
299b8: dgal nyi ma bzhin du bsal/ / lha dang klu dang lha men gas ba pa// dge bsnyen po mo dge slong dge slong ma// thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyis// bcom ldan pa na bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol/

300a1: khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang // da ltar yang ni shin tu nges par mkhyen// lus can mos paji bzhin khyod gzigs la// bcom chen po sel pa'i chos bshad gsol/
300a2: thub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na// zhing rnams dag pa rdul med 'thob par 'gyur// ji ltar smon lam 'grub pa 'thob 'gyur ba// de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol// ji ltar ser sna'i dri mas mi
300a3: gos shing / / ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang // sdigs pa dang ni de bzhin skur ba dang // brnyes pa dag kyang thub pa ji ltar bzod// sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir ba yi// 'jig rten dag gi sdug
300a4: bsngal bzlog slad du/ / bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams// ji ltar brtson 'bras chom zhing spyod par 'gyur// rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig mnyam bzhag cing // bsam gtan gnas paspyod yul nam dag ste/
300a5: padam chu'i drims mi gos ltar// ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos mi 'azur// thub pa ji ltar ba mo'i chos sgra zhing // mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pi'i bro ldan 'gyur// bstan paji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom nas/
300a6: byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shom
300a7: shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa// sgrub pa dang por bsam ning nan can bya ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam
300a8: grangs bad/ denas byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen byams pa 'di stas du masas te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don ci dang cizhi ga gas na/ bdag gdan 'di du btsun ste// gnas tan /

300b1: dgas dang / baju sa kyi na pa 'a bya/ de bzhin gshegs / byang chub mas dpa' dasas gad mi chu pa pan/ ni kyang du dpa' nga shigan bya
300b2: nyan mo dang / ma sa rgyas kyi pa yongs su sa pa'i ga sa ni/ / na dang / rangs sas ma ldan pa di'i 'a sa chen pa zhig sa to/ de du
300b3: sem da' sa dpa che bya mapa/ de sa rje grul don par 'du ba par byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge'i lang dug ni yu pa/ ri
300b4: sa da sa sa 'das ni gan gas / ga / hrI/ su gyu
300b5: bcom ldan 'das bri sngam las bzhes te/ seng ge'i dril bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das se ge'i bride la bzhugs mthag du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi'ams 'di rnam padrug dub tu gangoms
300b6: denasabacom ldan ras kyis/ med ldan pa shA ri'i dril pa' gyu ba// shA ri du chom pazhi dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'byung // bshig/
300b7: na/ di kyi semams pa dag par gas pa dang / sems can pa m+b+hi rdze dang / sngon 'grus rtsom padang / dge pa'i shes gnyen pa rten pa /
300b8: chos pa'i pode dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gyi

301a1: smom lam las mnyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun sum gapadang sangs su spyod par 'gyung ro// chos gcig pog nan/ gar bu'ad nya/ byang chub sems dpapa
301a2: bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing / 'dod pa dang 'dun pa skyed pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa gyur pa na
301a3: tshig 'di skad ces gal te bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu mabyung na/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsdus par gyur cig ces smras te// shA ri'i bri de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs
301a4: pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni skye ba thams cad du rab tu 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
301a5: ma byung yang rung / gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung bar de ni/ byang chub sems
301a6: dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/ / shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la
301a7: chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas la dag ba rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang / de chung ma dang / bu zo dang / bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang
301a8: ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par spong ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la sten pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / de la sna

301b1: dang / // ma / la nam 'ang sa nga rnan
301b2: ga'i byed/ pas na byang chub sems dpa byung chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad bral bar 'dod papa/ rnan tu bdu 'byung ba dang / bangon par 'byung bas
301b3: na kya 'bar gyi'o/ / ga'i du tsham gci pa dedang ldanan/ byang nabasems dpa ston pas las ma nyams shing / sa nas kyi nyi can ma chogs pa pang yangs da pa rna/
301b4: shari'i bu gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu 'dod pa de// bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/
301b5: gnyis gang zhe na/ gAri'i bu 'dis byang chub sems dpa' nyan pos kyi theg pami 'dod/ nyan thos kyi meg pa'i gtam pa srid/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang mi nyen/ nyan thos
301b6: kyi bslab pa la mi slob/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de bzhin pa dang /
301b7: gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o// shA ri'i bu de la gnan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du
301b8: 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang /

302a1: byang chub sems dpa'a'aba' shig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa dang / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrogs
302a2: shi tsham ston pa dang / 'dis te/ dab byen nyid dam tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen bskyed pa dang / ming thar na yang 'tsha la gyu ba'i thul po gyur
302a3: ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / g.yog 'khor ma byed par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi bring po tshad med grangs med pa
302a4: yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ / shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod
302a5: pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la banag na/ de ni debs bsod
302a6: nams ches mang du skyed do/ / shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na/ nyan thos dang
302a7: rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod na/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su gang gis pa yang yod par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan
302a8: dag byang chub kyi sems la rab tu 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ / shA ri'i bu chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas

302b1: ni gsan zhag dpa'i/ pa da pa tham sa su'an// / ga gzhanas rgyamags pa dang ldanan// byang chubasasapa da dzin papa ma nyam da/ sagatas can gsan na/ pa sa pa /
302b2: yongs su 'dzin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / zad zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa skyen pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o// shA ri'i bu/ tshul
302b3: khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'thob ste/ / bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par 'khor lo chos ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par bzas za ba dang /
302b4: mi 'jigs par gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par lung 'bog pa dang / mi 'jigs pa slob dpon dang / mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang / mi 'jigs par byams pa
302b5: dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad la spyod pa dang / des smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste// shA ri'i bu tshul
302b6: khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu po de dag 'thob po// shA ri'i bu/ zang zing med pa'i sems kyis/ chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos
302b7: bcu yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di de sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de shes kyi khe mi 'dod pa yin// de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim yongs su mi 'dzin pa yin/ de khyi ma
302b8: lasar sna med pa yin/ dogs dang zas dang ma lacha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad ngan don tsam gyis tshag shes pa yin/ des smras pa gzung bar

303a1: 'o ba yin/ lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin par rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa yin/ de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems skyed pa yin te// shA ri'i bri zang cing
303a2: skyo ba'i sems kyis/ chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yin tan gyi chos bcu ba de dag yongs su 'dzin ka// shA bri/ dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chubasems dpa' yin na gyi na yon
303a3: yongs su 'dzin to/ / bcu ga zhin/ gang 'di 'dra 'dzi rnam par spong ba dang / rab tu dben pa la sten pa dang / de bsam gtan la sems dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa
303a4: pa dang / de'i lus bde ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de'i tshangs par spyod pa par chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / tshogs rgyams ting nge 'dzini thob pa dang / des tshig dang / ye ger bstan pa rnams rgyud mi zab dang / ji sar thos pa'i chos rnams
303a5: kyi don rab tu shes pa/ / / shA ri'i bri dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi ban yon bcu bo de dag yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu chos ga ma nga rdzun/ byang chub sems dpa' smon pa
303a6: las mnyims nga sa sa rgyas kyi shing gi yon tan kod pa di 'i bu 'dod pa lta ba yongs su 'an to/ / gso thagazhan sa chos shing ldanan/ byang chub sems da 'a gron la ma la ma nyams shing / sa sa kyi
303a7: ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongasu 'dzin to/ / bzhig she na/ sha ri'i bri 'di la byang chubs pas dpa' don par smra ba yin/ de ji skad sa pade bzhin byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ nga rgyal tshar gcad pa'i phyir grags shing / zag
303a8: dog dang ser sa yongs su spangs pa yin/ pha rol 'byor pa yid dga' pa yin na// shA ra~M khri ban pa 'di dag ni bden par snang 'i byang chubasems da'i pan pon te/ bzhi ga zhe na/ 'di lta// de'i khanas kya

303b1: la'i dri'i ring 'byung ba dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing / tshig 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
303b2: gsang phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzini pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i ban yon no// shA ri'i bri bzhi po 'di dag ning rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/
303b3: bzhig she na/ gang 'dir na 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnga mo dang / b.lang dang / bong bu dang / rta'i skye gnas dang / de bzhin du gzhan smad par skye ba rnam par spong ba dang / mi smad par 'gyur ba dang / gan
303b4: phyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'gyur ba ste// shA ri'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon yin no// shA ri'i bu
303b5: bzhi po 'di dag ni/ phrag dog dang / ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de gtong ba'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba'i dus na/ sbyin ba dag du 'gyur ba dang / de tshus
303b6: khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs na/ khyim gyi sgo gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i gtong ba dang len pa la su yang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni brag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// sha
303b7: bubazhi po 'di dag ni/ pha rol 'byor ba la dga' ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ste/ bdag 'di dag gi ched dadu/ go cha bgos nas/ 'di dag la bde
303b8: bar sbyar ba bya ba yin na/ sems can 'di dag rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar 'tsho'o zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / tshu la stsogs pa dang / bgo skal

304a1: la spyod pa mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe phran sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum 'tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe/ de la rgyal po
304a2: yang dga' bar 'gyur na/ sems can gzhan lta spos kyang ci dgos// de longs spyod dang / kun tu spyod pa rgyal chen po la sems 'jug pa ste// sha ri'i bri bzhi po de dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan
304a3: yon can no/ / sha ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// sha ri'i bu gzhan yang ces
304a4: lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las minyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa jilta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzini cing yongs su spyod ste/ ldag she na/ sha ri'i bru 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
304a5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su yon tan bkod pa rnams pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kun tu tshol zhing / de gang la chos nyan pa de la/ byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'di dag yongs su bsgrub
304a6: pa de kun 'dre zhing des chos de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o/ / sha ri'i bri gzhan yang / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar smon cing / de tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/
304a7: de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon pa de dang der skyes te/ de dang der skyes nas/ de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sems shing rtog ste/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'am/ byang chub sems
304a8: dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ longs spyod dang kun tu spong ba phun sum tshogs pa mtshan ma mngon te// des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas/ gus pa dang bcas zhes dang bcas shing / bral mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs

304b1: yang ngas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang chubasams dpa sad lta dan/ sangs rgyas rgyan gnatan yodas can pa la mas na ma ldan sa pan/ dbazhan gshegs padas kyang / de lhag pa bsam pasatsun
304b2: gnams kyis ngasacas kyi ning ga yon tan dngapa/ rgya chen pha yongs su 'jub bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston ci dag par nga yul dang / sang bsan pa de bzhin dran ta da ga/ gang dug zhan yang /
